tool_description: Annoyed by subtitle in your favorite movie ? This API removes subtitle from image and video.  Always free !
name: Clear Subtitle
title: Clear Subtitle

api_list.name: Main
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://clear-subtitle.p.rapidapi.com/run"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "clear-subtitle.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://clear-subtitle.p.rapidapi.com/run"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "clear-subtitle.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
